Desc.entry: A registered charity which promotes the development of young people in achieving their full physical, intellectual, social and spiritual potential as individuals, as responsible citizens and as members of their communities. Provides an enjoyable and attractive scheme of progressive training based on the Scout Promise and Law and guided by adult leadership. Supports 72 Scout groups for young people aged 6-20 years (Beavers, Cub Scouts, Scouts and Explorer Scouts). Resources include meeting room and shop.

ContactName.entry: Mr David Worth, Administrator/Mr Alan Cull, Honorary Secretary

category.entry: CHILDREN AND YOUNG PEOPLE - LEISURE ACTIVITIES
